wikipedia_page.main: Jonny Gould is a British media presenter, sports journalist, and political commentator. He has formerly broadcast on Sky News, Smooth Radio, and Talksport among others. Gould is Jewish and has commented on antisemitism, conservative politics, and the state of Israel across a number of outlets including his own Jewish State podcast.

response: * Jonny Gould, English radio sports broadcaster on Smooth Radio
